name: Refinery Rush
description:
Enjoy bouncing meteoroids into the proper refineries in this quick paced  game. Your job is to collect falling meteoroids by bouncing them into the refineries on either side of the screen, but make sure to catch the right ones!

Use the A and D (or arrow) keys to move your player.

Move the mouse to rotate the bounce pad to change the angle the meteoroids will bounce.

Left-click the mouse to jump a small amount

Background music by Patrick de Arteaga
Background art by DinV Studi
Asteroid sprites by EVPOGames
Character sprites by Kenney.nl
SCI-FI Platformer Tileset by 2dGameArt.com
